bio.paragraph1: I'm Shachar Weissberg, an Electrical & Systems Engineer with over a decade of experience in high-performance hardware development and complex system integration across LiDAR, radar, optical, and defense technologies.
bio.paragraph2: I specialize in designing high-speed PCBs, power and signal integrity, and leading multidisciplinary system development — integrating optics, FPGA, embedded software, and algorithmic components. Over the years, I've led end-to-end R&D processes, from early prototyping to production-grade deployment.
bio.paragraph3: Most recently, I served as CTO and co-founder of a fintech startup, where I led the cloud infrastructure, backend architecture, and AI-driven software modules — building a scalable, production-ready platform from scratch. This role connected my deep hardware background with modern full-stack and DevOps practices (Flutter, FastAPI, Supabase, Azure, NGINX), and sharpened my system thinking and product leadership.
bio.paragraph4: I bring a unique blend of engineering precision, system-level vision, and hands-on execution, and I'm currently seeking my next challenge — where I can lead meaningful technology and deliver impactful solutions.
